DIA_13310_Bandit_GiveAwayGold_05_04: The rules are... simple - 50 gold pieces and I let you go.
DIA_13310_Bandit_GiveAwayGold_05_05: Otherwise, my sword and your face will have a close encounter.
DIA_13310_Bandit_NoGold_03_02: Then I'll take everything you have!
DIA_13310_Bandit_GiveGold_03_02: Haha! I knew you had something in your head.
